name: Ninja Temple
description:
When Ninja hears the news that his grand ninja master was held captive in a temple in Mount Kaikoma, he sets on a journey to leave his ninja school in Iga Ueno and save him from the hands of the rebels.

Ninja is a master of disguise. Avoiding to be seen by his enemies, he gathers important intelligence and dodges them with his unique swift moves.

Help the Ninja get to his grand master in one piece and prove everyone that he is a hero. But be careful! There are many enemies and hidden traps in the labyrinths of the temple!
